pkgmetadata.longdescription: Immunoglobulin Somatic Hypermutation Analysis // Provides a computational framework for Bayesian estimation of antigen- driven selection in immunoglobulin (Ig) sequences, providing an intuitive means of analyzing selection by quantifying the degree of selective pressure. Also provides tools to profile mutations in Ig sequences, build models of somatic hypermutation (SHM) in Ig sequences, and make model-dependent distance comparisons of Ig repertoires.
